name: Hollow Dissent
description:
Hollow Dissent is a top down tactical shooter set in the dying embers of cold war era paranormal experimentation. You are Agent Micheal Carnes. You are an operative at the top of your game, and your game is wetwork. Your mission is to infiltrate Facility 12 Gamma, eliminate all hostile forces, and retrieve or destroy all data pertinent to project Epsilon. WARNING: HALLUCINATIONS HAVE BEEN REPORTED ONSITE. ANY ANOMALOUS HAPPENINGS OR BEINGS ENCOUNTERED ARE HALLUCINATIONS AND SHOULD BE REGARDED AS SUCH. GOOD HUNTING.

Consider this game a prototype of 3D things to come. Pay what you want and enjoy.
